name: Carnage (itch) ([Insert Name] Studios)
description:
Carnage was made during a gamemaking course in the spring of 2021 in the University of Skövde. The game is a fast paced roguelike with emphasis on gore and action. You find yourself in an asylum with demon like monsters emerging on you in each room. Fight your way through the asylum and try to figure out what is going on in this brutal bloodfest!


NOTE!
There is a tutorial for new players in the first room. If this tutorial does not appear, then enable it in the Options and restart the level.
